canonical.name: Fong
canonical.title: 55. Fong / Abundance, Fullness
canonical.judgment: Fong intimates progress and development. When a king has reached the point which the name denotes, there is no occasion to be anxious through fear of change. Let them be as the sun at noon.
canonical.image: The trigrams representing thunder and lightning combine to form Fong. The superior person, in accordance with this, decides cases of litigation, and apportions punishments with exactness.

1.text: shows its subject meeting with their mate. Though they are both of the same character, there will be no error. Advance will call forth approval.

2.text: shows its subject surrounded by screens so large and thick that at midday they can see from them the constellation of the Bushel. If they go and try to enlighten their ruler who is thus emblemed, they will make themselves to be viewed with suspicion and dislike. Let them cherish their feeling of sincere devotion that they may thereby move their ruler's mind, and there will be good fortune.

3.text: shows its subject with an additional screen of a large and thick banner, through which at midday they can see the small Mei star. In the darkness they break their right arm; but there will be no error.

4.text: shows its subject in a tent so large and thick that at midday they can see from it the constellation of the Bushel. But they meet with the subject of the first line, as nine like themselves. There will be good fortune.

5.text: shows its subject bringing around them people of brilliant ability. There will be occasion for congratulation and praise. There will be good fortune.

6.text: shows its subject with their house made large, but only serving as a screen to their household. When they look at their door, it is still, and there is nobody about it. For three years no one is to be seen. There will be evil.

metadata.notes: Original translation preserved from pyChing v1.2.2
